ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.RestrictionsOnAwardsTxt: GRANTS ARE DIRECTED TO 501(C)(3) ORGANIZATIONS WHICH FALL WITHIN THE PRINCIPAL CHARITABLE PURPOSES OF THE FOUNDATION. THE FOUNDATION SUPPORTS PROGRAMS THAT IMPROVE EDUCATION, HEALTH, FAMILY WELL-BEING, ARTS, CULTURE, AND ANIMAL WELFARE.
